titleStmt.title: Description of Library Company, Yi2S91073.D: Sharḥ Miʾah ʿāmil / شرح مائة عامل

notesStmt.note: Marginal notations in English listing dates of analysis, dates range from 13 August [1813?] to 23 February 1814.
Signature of Henry Burges, 1810 (first flyleaf recto inside paper cover, last flyleaf verso before back paper cover)
Lines of poetry copied in a learner's hand on the flyleaves along with vocabulary words.
Non-European laid paper; no chain lines.

msItem.title: Sharḥ Miʾah ʿāmil / شرح مائة عامل

supportDesc.extent: iii, 45, iii; 192 x 110 (130 x 60) mm bound to 200 x 120 mm

decoDesc.decoNote: Textblock border-ruled in black, blue, orange, red; lines ruled in ink with beige watercolor behind the written lines; page-opening frame-ruled in red.

binding.p: Disbound. Marbled paper sides with brown leather spine with spine title, "ARABIC MSS". Previously bound as a pamphlet with a purple paper cover; modern binding is over the pamphlet binding.

history.provenance: Bequest of Charles G. Sower; signature of Henry Burges? (front and back flyleaves)

keywords.term: Jurjānī, ʻAbd al-Qāhir ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, -1078? ʻAwāmil al-miʼah / جرجاني، عبد القاهر بن عبد الرحمان، عوامل المائة
